title: This was posted on /co/ for Samurai Jack.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/Q59E4AV.gif

>One of episodes has Jack deeply wounded almost bleeding out
>Enemies keep outnumbering him
>He can't hold out much longer 
>Finds himself cornered 
>Body finally gives out as he falls down awaiting certain death
>He hears the enemies about to strike 
>Suddenly a steel-like sound is heard slicing through the air
>Jack opens his eyes to see a robed individual with a katana in his hand
>Every one of the enemies has been swiftly killed
>The individual takes off his hood
https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-7b8R08LAPHI/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAABQ/wEejUduNVlY/photo.jpg
